short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attach text notes to web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Floating Web Notes allows you to attach textual notes to web pages, providing just-in-time information as you browse. It's a simple yet powerful tool to make your online experience more productive and personalized. It enhances your browsing by keeping important information at your fingertips.

üìé Seamless Note Attachment:
Easily attach textual notes to any webpage. Your notes appear in a single, non-intrusive window, enhancing your browsing without cluttering your workspace.

üì° URL Pattern Matching:
Customize which webpages your notes appear on using specific URL patterns. This feature is perfect for dynamic websites or when you need the same note across multiple pages or even domains.

üòé Minimalist Design:
Floating Web Notes boasts a minimalist interface, focusing on functionality without unnecessary distractions. Editing URL patterns and accessing user options, like keyboard shortcuts, is straightforward and intuitive.

üîê Local Data Storage:
All notes are stored directly in your browser, ensuring that your information remains private and secure. Nothing is tracked.

Some example use cases:

- Take personal notes over shared documents
- Save discount codes for online stores
- Highlight useful keyboard shortcuts
- Set reminders for the next time you visit a website

üöÄ FUTURE ENHANCEMENTS

Look forward to exciting upcoming features, including the ability to drag the notes window around the screen, export and import notes, note searching, and themes/dark mode for a more custom experience.
